installRequirements()[source]

Method to install all the requirements needed for continuous integration and write results to a file.

Returns

Print statement that the installation of requirements either failed or succeeded.

sendNotification(userSender)[source]

Method to send message through email with with build results to user email :return: Results of build

staticSyntaxCheck()[source]

Method to check if syntax is correct and write the results to a file.

Returns

Print statement that checking the syntax either failed or succeeded.

testing()[source]

Method to test that the CI server works and write the results to a file.

Returns

Print statement that the testing either failed or succeeded.

src.app.continuous_integration_notification module

src.app.continuous_integration_server module

src.app.continuous_integration_server.continuous_integration_post()[source]

This function is the endpoint for GitHub webhooks to handle POST request. 1. Create a history entry recording the results 2. Clone the repository 3. Install the requirements.txt 4. Syntax checking 5. Test on unittests 6. Remove the repository

Returns

If the server runs successfully, return “Succeeded” Otherwise, return “This action is not supported by the server.”

src.app.continuous_integration_server.get_continuous_integration()[source]

Indicate it’s a continuous integration server.

src.app.continuous_integration_server.get_resultFile(filename)[source]

Record the result of handling requests in the path ./results/filename.

src.app.continuous_integration_server.get_results()[source]

Get the page content from the recorded results
